title: The Old mill
brief_description: An early Disney color animated cartoon about birds and animals living happily in a deserted old windmill. Their peace and comfort are disturbed by a violent storm. Disney animation, featuring first significant use of multiplane camera. (Award: Academy Award Winner, 1937)
